hindi:
माला फेरत जुग भया, फिरा न मन का फेर।
कर का मनका डारि के, मन का मनका फेर।
english:
Mala ferat jug bhaya, fira na man ka fer.
Kar ka manka daari ke, man ka manka fer.
translation:
Eons have passed in people turning the rosary in hands, but the mind's restlessness remains.
Drop the beads of your hands, and turn the beads of your mind instead.
